あーあー。マイクテス。マイクテス。\nワンツーワンツー。:
Ah-ah. Mic test. Mic test.
One-two, one-two.
みなさーん！ コンチワー！ 制圧ってるぅ～？ みんなご存知！\nみんな大好き！:
Hello, everyone! Good afternoon! How's the suppression going~? Everyone knows!
Everyone loves! I'm Amane, the host of the 'Suppression Battle Executive Committee'!
えっ？ ご存知ない……？ じゃあ、今知ってくださいっす！\nこれで問題ナシ！！:
Huh? You don't know...? Then, please remember now!
No problem!! We're already besties, lovers, and family!!
あぁ、『スタンピード』か～。\nちなみに柊校舎だけじゃなくて、学園の全校舎に向け:
Ah, it's 'Stampede'.
By the way, it's not just the Hiiragi building, it's being broadcast to all the school buildings.
アマネちゃんからのお知らせっすよ！ 先ほどスタンピード――\nメイズシフターの大:
It's an announcement from Amane-chan! Just now, a Stampede――
A massive outbreak of Maze Shifters has been confirmed! The scale is about the same as before!
そんなわけで……ドンドンパフパフ！ 嬉し恥ずかし！\n癒やし壊しのサークル対抗制:
So... Boom boom, puff puff! Happy and embarrassed!
The healing and destructive Circle Suppression Battle begins~!
って感じで、メイズシフター討伐を目的にしたイベントが開かれるの。\nあいつらも生:
That's the vibe, an event to defeat Maze Shifters is being held.
They're living creatures too, so they occasionally have massive outbreaks~.
大量発生と聞くと危なそうなイメージだが、その様子だとある程度\n予測や管理ができ:
Hearing 'massive outbreak' sounds dangerous, but from the looks of it,
It seems like it's somewhat predictable and manageable. They even made it an event.
ピコピコピーン！ ち・な・み・に！\nただの討伐イベントじゃありません！ サーク:
Piko-piko-peen! By the way!
This isn't just a defeat event! It's a circle competition!
たくさんのサークルが参加して、その討伐数を競うんです！\nもちろん、報酬も出ます:
Many circles participate and compete for the number of defeats!
Of course, there are rewards too!
できないですね～。相手は倒しても倒してもたくさん湧いてくるんで、\nひとりでの参:
No, they can't~. The opponents keep coming no matter how many you defeat,
so participating alone is dangerous.
報酬が出るからって無茶しちゃう子が出てしまうんですよ。\nそのときフォローや止め:
Some kids might overdo it because of the rewards.
If there's no one to support or stop them at that time...
まあ、相手の数を考えると、\nこっちも集団で参加するのが道理だよな。:
Well, considering the number of opponents,
It's only logical for us to participate as a group.
そんなわけで、サークルでの参加は絶・対・条・件です！: That's why circle participation is an absolute requirement!
おおー、%usernameusernameuserna%のＡＩちゃんって優秀だね: Oh, %usernameusernameuserna%'s AI-chan is excellent, isn't it?
ふふん！ まあ、ボクは優秀なＡＩですからね！\nこの程度の解説なんてお手の物です:
Hehe! Well, I'm an excellent AI!
This level of explanation is a piece of cake!
――なのでサークル参加が必須ってワケっす！\nメイズ討伐数１位の栄誉と報酬を目指:
――So circle participation is a must!
Aim for the honor and rewards of being number one in Maze defeats~!
まあ、さっきの説明、全部解説の子がもっと詳しくしてたけどね。: Well, the explanation earlier, the commentary girl explained it in more detail though.
あとでいっぱい慰めておくよ。それよりも、\nメイズシフターが大量発生しているなら:
I'll comfort you a lot later. More importantly,
If Maze Shifters are massively spawning, we can't leave them alone.
――それでは皆さん心の準備いいっすか！？\n最強のサークルはどこだ！？ 盛り上が:
――So, is everyone ready!?
Which is the strongest circle!? Let's get hyped!!
笑いアリ！ 涙アリ？ ポロリもアルかな！？\nサークル対抗制圧戦……スタートっす:
There will be laughs! Tears? Maybe even slips!?
Circle Suppression Battle... Start!!
